titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on bitolylene diisocyanate (TODI).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/13/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on bitolylene diisocyanate (TODI).
